General.Name: Cartica Acquisition Corp Unit
General.Description: Cartica Acquisition Corp does not have any significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to identify and complete a business combination in the technology sector in India. Cartica Acquisition Corp was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Washington, the District of Columbia.
General.Address: 1775 I Street NW, Washington, DC, United States, 20006
